title: Raw Commons (6 portraits in the group)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Raw Commons (6 portraits in the group)
posts.post_content:
Hello Friends,

I have some commons for sale.  Most present pretty well but have some flaw that makes them grade out at poor or fair.

Paypal f/f or check/MO all fine

Shipping:
$1 for one or two cards.  $2.32 for more than two.

Howell (pinhole) $15
Quillen (pinhole) $16
Street (pinhole) $17
Ames $13  SOLD
Bridwell $14
Lobert $18 SOLD
Hoffman (pinhole) $17
Street (pinhole) $18
Wllhelm (Damn near perfect card with some tape residue and a tiny speck flaking off the top left corner.  I've been informed by my esteemed colleague Frank B. that this card has already been unsuccessfully soaked.) $32
McElveen $11
Clymer $13
Raymond $16
Pfeister (crease-free and name on top & bottom) 24 SOLD



Any questions, please feel free to ask.  PM or email to [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]

Hey Luke, will you be at the show on Saturday?
If so, maybe I could pick up the HR Baker from you in person?:p

Let me know, I'll be there at the opening bell  and staying several hours if all my plans come together!

Brian, 
I will be there early on Saturday.   I'll bring it for you and mark it sold.  Will be great to meet you!
Added new cards and dropped the price.  I included a pic of the Duffy and Jennings because the scan makes them look pretty bad.  The Duffy has a major crease but is nice otherwise.
New lot.  Re-using an old listing.
dropped my prices - priced to move
